> True, but I've also seen quite a few examples=
 where TDD-written
> classes led to micro-design that forced a lot of refac=
toring to be

icular,
> the idea to "do the simplest thing that can possibly work" can be=

> a=
nd it's safe to start doing things that might not necessarily be the
> simp=
lest thing at the moment but that will save you time in the near
> future.

>

ult(){}

testVoidReturn(){}
then write product code(I'm clear before write those tes=
